data.name: Cakewalk Expansion Pack - Video Game Sound Designer Backgrounds
data.detailed_description:
You must own the STEAM version of Music Creator or SONAR to use this DLC

Video Game Backgrounds features rhythmic textures and soundscapes that will instantly create refreshing background beds. Real time controllers allow designers to sculpt textures with filters, LFO’s, pitch, rhythmic effects, and more. 68 programs - 190 megabytes
data.about_the_game:
You must own the STEAM version of Music Creator or SONAR to use this DLC

Video Game Backgrounds features rhythmic textures and soundscapes that will instantly create refreshing background beds. Real time controllers allow designers to sculpt textures with filters, LFO’s, pitch, rhythmic effects, and more. 68 programs - 190 megabytes
data.short_description: You must own the STEAM version of Music Creator or SONAR to use this DLCVideo Game Backgrounds features rhythmic textures and soundscapes that will instantly create refreshing background beds. Real time controllers allow designers to sculpt textures with filters, LFO’s, pitch, rhythmic effects, and more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom Quad Core 9750 2.4 Ghz or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card that can display 1280x800 minimum screen resolution
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO or WDM compatible sound device recommended
  • Additional Notes: Requires the Cakewalk Sound Center virtual instrument

data.legal_notice: You must own the STEAM version of Cakewalk Sound Center, Music Creator or SONAR to use this DLC
